Package com.availaboard.UI.frontend_functionality

Class ResourceGrid<E extends Resource>

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.grid.Grid
com.availaboard.UI.frontend_functionality.ResourceGrid<E>
Type Parameters:
E - The Class that is used to tell the Grid which Fields must be loaded.
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.BlurNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.Focusable, com.vaadin.flow.component.FocusNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasEnabled, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasSize, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasTheme, com.vaadin.flow.data.event.SortEvent.SortNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.data.provider.HasDataGenerators, com.vaadin.flow.data.provider.HasDataView, com.vaadin.flow.data.provider.HasLazyDataView, com.vaadin.flow.data.provider.HasListDataView, Serializable
@CssImport("./styles/webpage-styles/availaboard-grid.css") public class ResourceGrid<E extends Resource> extends com.vaadin.flow.component.grid.Grid
Used to instantiate grid with the type E. The Grid contains a Name and a Status column. It also has a pop-up window displaying information about the Resource for each item.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ResourceGrid

      public ResourceGrid(Class<? extends Resource> type)
      Used to set the type of Resource the Grid needs to load.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of Resource that the Grid use's to load the Resource's.

  • Method Details

    • loadGrid

      public com.vaadin.flow.component.grid.Grid<E> loadGrid(Class<? extends Resource> res)
      Creates a new Grid with two columns; Name and Status. Then it loads all of the Resource's and add's them to the grid.
      Parameters:
      res - The type of Resource that the Grid use's to load the Resource's.
      Returns:
      A Grid with two columns and all of the Resource of type E added.
